Dictionary French-English

encre noun, feminine—

ink n (almost always used)

Je prfre crire l'encre bleue sur papier blanc. — I prefer to write with blue ink on white paper.
less common:
toner n

encrer verb—

ink v (inked, inked)

Il faut encrer le tampon avant de l'utiliser. — Prior to use, you must ink the stamp.

Examples:

encre de Chine f—

Indian ink n
Chinese ink n

encre indlbile f—

indelible ink n

encre vgtale f—

vegetal ink n
vegetable-based ink n

worry v
